name: Common Attributes Trait
description: The common attributes available in all classes.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the finding or incident.

labels.description:
The list of category labels attached to the event or specific attributes.

For example: ["network", "connection.ip:destination", "device.ip:source"]

message.description: The description of the finding or incident.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the finding report.

time.description: The time when the finding was created.

version.description: The version of the event class, using Semantic Versioning Specification (SemVer). For example: 1.0.0. Event consumers use the version to determine the available event attributes.
